channel.title: Collaboration on LiaScript
channel.description: Recent content in Collaboration on LiaScript

item.title: Spec-Driven Development: Was Lehrende von Entwicklern lernen können
item.description: Von der Software-Entwicklung zur Lehre Seit der Veröffentlichung von ChatGPT hat sich die Landschaft der generativen KI rasant entwickelt.

item.title: Joining forces: OER Hackathon Göttingen 2025
item.description: From April 28 to 30, the OER Hackathon took place in Göttingen (Edu-Sharing Network).

item.title: Collaborative drawings made with LiaScript
item.description: In this article we will explore how to create a collaborative drawing canvas (in other words a whiteboard) using LiaScript’s internal publish -subscribe mechanisms.

item.title: LiaScript - WorldMap
item.description: This idea was motivated by the OER-World Map in order to to visualize the distribution of educational content that was created with LiaScript or events and meetings.

item.title: Freiberg - Research Seminar
item.description: In this talk André Dietrich gives a brief overview on the research history around LiaScript and RemoteLabs.

item.title: Liascript User Symposium (Recording)
item.description: Discover WHO is utilizing and creating free, open online courses using the user-friendly LiaScript Markdown and WHY.

item.title: Students work on open learning content
item.description: This is a translated version of a German article that was published on april 22 in 2022 here: https://tu-freiberg.
